description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Be the best racer in the Ninja Edition of Antigrav Racing Championship.  Choose any of the 8 high speed hovercrafts and rule on the 5 Ninja race tracks. ARC Ninja Edition features a top 50 online scoreboard for each track.  Can you make it to the top ??!!
description.short: Be the best racer in the Ninja Edition of Antigrav Racing Championship.  Choose any of the 8 high speed hovercrafts and rule on the 5 Ninja race tracks. ARC Ninja Edition features a top 50 online scoreboard for each track.  Can you make it to the top ??!!
